Text: MPWomen Summit Gala Dinner Cc LouiseEnjoyed talking with you Were inviting our Summit speakers and panelists to invite a guest for Thursday evening as followsignore the Aug deadline but please let us know as soon as you can Thanks LouiseWere so looking forward to seeing you at the FORTUNE Most Powerful Women Summit and wed like to extend an additional invitation Would you like to have a notable Los Angelesarea woman as your guest for our gala evening Thursday October The dinner at the RitzCarlton in Pasadena will include our keynote session with Jack Welch and also a special performance by Tracey Ullman on Women of Style and Substance The idea here is twofold to give speakers like you the opportunity to include a special guest in one of the highlight sessions of the summit and to sprinkle the evening with some of LAs most influential women We ask that you keep this themepowerful women of LAin mind as you decide whom to invite Please let Suzanne OLeary or me know your suggested guests name and contact information by email or phone by Monday August which will allow us to coordinate the list and invitations In the next few weeks well send an invitation to the person you suggest and note that wed like her to join us for the evening as your guest Thanks much and all the bestPattie
